column5: Ukraine captured Mykilske recently without official statement. Shevchenko has been a gray area for several weeks
column6: and Russia has been heavily shelling it. And Solodke has been changing hands between Russia and Ukraine.

column4: Russia attacked Velyka Novosilka today (14). The attack was repelled
column5: but it appears this town is a major focus for any future Russian offensives
column6: which could occur sooner than you think.

description: Russians claim to have detected and repelled a Ukrainian recon element (15).
Russian sources confirmed Ukrainian control over Andriivka and Lozove and claim Bilohirka is contested. The interesting thing is that the same Russian sources claim Blahodativka is contested (16)
column4: which would represent a new Ukrainian movement. At least new to me.
